    • Method Detail

      • getArrayItems

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,? extends net.sf.JRecord.schema.jaxb.IItem> getArrayItems()
        Get the Map of "Array's" by Level-Name (Group / Field names)
        Returns:
        Map of "Cobol Array Definitions" by "Updated-Cobol-Name"

      • getRecordHierarchyMap

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> getRecordHierarchyMap()
        Map hold Record-Hierarchy-Level by record name e.g. If you have a "Record-Hierarchy" of Purchase-Order +----------- Pack-Record +-----------Location-Record The Record-Hierarchy Map will hold Purchase-Order --> 0 Pack-Record --> 1 Location-Record --> 2
        Returns:

      • getRecordIndex

        int getRecordIndex(java.lang.String name)
        Get the Record-Index for a name
        Parameters:
        name - Record-Name
        Returns:
        Record-Index

      • getMaxRecordHierarchyLevel

        int getMaxRecordHierarchyLevel()
        If you have Record-Hierarchy like: Purchase-Order +----------- Pack-Record +-----------Location-Record The Hierarchy Depth would be 3
        Returns:
        The Hierarchy Depth

      • getDuplicateFieldsStatus

        int getDuplicateFieldsStatus()
        Returns:
        Type of field name duplicates in the copybook, possible values are
          D_NO_DUPLICATES
        • D_NO_DUPLICATES_IN_RECORD
        • D_DUPLICATES

      • updateName

        java.lang.String updateName(java.lang.String name)
        Reformat the Cobol name to output format (Camel Case etc)
        Parameters:
        name - Cobol field name
        Returns:
        reformatted field name

      • getFieldLookup

        IGetRecordFieldByName getFieldLookup()
        Returns:
        Get class that can find a field from the Record/Field name

      • isRedefinedBinaryField

        boolean isRedefinedBinaryField()
        Returns:
        Wether there are redefined binary field. Used in cb2xml to decide on validility checks for Redefined fields
